sentences.en: Add 1 tsp of flour to the tray and mash everything together.
sentences.cn: 在烤盘里加一小勺面粉,把整个烤盘都磨成面糊,使面粉沾上所有汤汁.

sentences.en: Everyone in our village cooks rice flour mash when Spring Festival approaches.
sentences.cn: 每到过年的时候,我们村家家户户都要蒸粉团.

sentences.en: He beat the potato into a mash before eating it.
sentences.cn: 他把马铃薯捣烂后再吃.

sentences.en: I'm feeding our horses the same mash the O'Briens used to win Gold Cups.
sentences.cn: 我现在给我们的马喂的糊状饲料和奥布赖恩家族夺得金杯的赛马吃的饲料是一样的。

sentences.en: MASH NOTES were old affairs in their mildest form.
sentences.cn: 情书都是用最温柔的形式写的老一套东西.

sentences.en: Mash the bananas with a fork.
Mash the bananas with a tablespoon, adding vanilla extract and salt.
sentences.cn: 香蕉用汤勺捣成泥, 加入香草精和盐拌均匀.

sentences.en: Mash the beans ladle until they blend in well with the meat.
sentences.cn: 加入豆豉,用炒勺弄碎,这样和肉糜混合.

sentences.en: Mash the fruit up ( with a fork ) so that the baby can eat it.
sentences.cn: ( 用叉子 ) 把水果戳烂孩子就能吃了.

sentences.en: Mash the potatoes with a fork.
sentences.cn: 用叉把马铃薯捣碎成泥.

sentences.en: Mash them in a bowl with a little lemon juice.
sentences.cn: 加入一点柠檬汁在碗里捣碎.

sentences.en: Pick a few leaves from the common lawn weed plantain, wash them, mash them, and apply as a poultice to the affected skin.
sentences.cn: 从常见的草坪杂草车前草上摘几片叶子，洗净，捣碎，然后像膏药一样敷在受感染的皮肤上。

sentences.en: Remove skinless tomatoes. Mash to puree with wooden spatula.
sentences.cn: 取出罐装无皮番茄,用木勺压烂.

sentences.en: Squash, dunk, ferment and beat the white materials. Mix the wood mash.
sentences.cn: 将树皮原料等碾碎, 浸泡, 发酵,打浆,加入树糊调成浆.

sentences.en: The soup was a mash of grain and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 那是用粮食和蔬菜做成的浓汤。

sentences.en: You can help mash up the potatoes for me.
sentences.cn: 你可以帮我把马铃薯捣烂.

trans.tran_cn: 麦芽浆，谷物饲料，糊状物，土豆泥
trans.tran_en: a mixture of  malt  or crushed grain and hot water, used to make beer or  whisky
to crush something, especially a food that has been cooked, until it is soft and smooth

trans.tran_cn: 捣碎，磨碎，捣成糊状的混和物，〈俚〉调情，挑逗（异性）
